articleCollectQuerySQL: select * from article_collect where user_id='<%= user_id %>' limit <%= start %>, <%= end %>
articleCollectFlagSQL: select count(*) as count from article_collect where user_id='<%= user_id %>' and article_id='<%= article_id %>'
articleCollectQueryCountSQL: select count(*) as count from article_collect where user_id='<%= user_id %>'
articleCollectSQL: insert into article_collect (user_id, article_id) values('<%= user_id %>','<%= article_id %>')
articleCollectCancelSQL: delete from article_collect where user_id='<%= user_id %>' and article_id='<%= article_id %>'
